import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' class FruitsCounter extends Component { state = { mangoesCount: 0, bananasCount: 0, } render() { const {mangoesCount, bananasCount} = this.state return (

Bob ate {mangoesCount} mangoes {bananasCount} bananas

) } } export default FruitsCounter
